description:
Make your grandma proud in Tokyo Cooking! Run your own restaurant and prepare the most iconic Japanese dishes. Take orders from customers, prepare their meals with passion and listen to their opinions to become better and better with each passing day.


DO THE COOKING BY THE BOOK…
Your kitchen has all the necessary equipment and ingredients you will need to prepare the most delicious sushi. Follow and complete each step from your to-do list while choosing from many available kinds of fish, vegetables and spices and adding them depending on the client's wish.


…AND CUSTOMIZE TO YOUR HEART’S CONTENT
Earn money from the orders and customize the interior of your Japanese restaurant in Tokyo Cooking. At the end of each day, you will have access to your laptop, where you can browse through equipment you can purchase for your place. Enjoy new chairs, tables, plants and utensils.

Become a master of composing the perfect sushi. Be precise and use the exact amount of ingredients such as soy sauce or rice. Complete mini-games to receive extra money as a bonus for your order.


KEY FEATURES:
- You can learn to make your own sushi!
- A total of 32 unique ingredients like fish, vegetables that NEVER run out
- Step-by-step recipes
- Interesting customers
- Day/night system and access to laptop after work
- 6 unique sushi recipes like Hosomaki or Uramaki and relaxing tea
name: Tokyo Cooking
